author: Microsoft
description:
Indigenous heritage is a source of strength and vision—shaping communities and industries worldwide. The Code of Us honors Indigenous employees whose stories and traditions enrich Microsoft’s culture and future.​

Discover stories from the Indigenous community at Microsoft helping shape the future of our company: https://aka.ms/TheCodeOfUs/Indigenous.

Subscribe to Microsoft on YouTube here: https://aka.ms/SubscribeToYouTube

Follow us on social: 
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/microsoft/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Microsoft
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Microsoft/ 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/microsoft/ 
 
For more about Microsoft, our technology, and our mission, visit https://aka.ms/microsoftstories
title: Indigenous stories at Microsoft: building a future rooted in tradition
